attributes.action: make derogation or "opting out" of the European Convention on Human Rights beyond the power of any political body.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We recognise that Human Rights are of importance equal to that of National Security. Therefore, any threat to National Security, whether internal or external in origin, can never be used as a justification for amending or repealing Human Rights legislation.

It follows that the argument that infringing Human Rights saves lives can never be valid. This is because it is accepted that lives are expended in defence of National Security, and therefore it is equally worthy to expend lives in defence of Human Rights.
